description: The round payoff this round was 107. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 53.5.
Mutual selection of option 1 maximizes both players' payoffs
Unilateral defection (choosing option 2) yields lower individual payoffs than mutual cooperation
Mutual defection (both choosing option 2) halves the total payoff and splits it, leading to the lowest individual outcomes
Coordination on option 1 is incentivized as the Pareto-optimal strategy
